rundown: 10-1 W @ Detroit Tigers Bryce Elder: 7.0 innings, 1 earned run, 5 hits, 1 HR, 6 strikeouts Batters: Drake Baldwin (2 hits - 4 AB, 1 HR, 3 RBI) Ronald Acuña Jr. (1 hit - 4 AB, 1 HR, 2 RBI) Ha-Seong Kim (1 hit - 4 AB, 1 HR, 2 RBI) The Braves secured a dominant victory over the Detroit Tigers, showcasing their offensive power and solid pitching. Key highlights include Drake Baldwin's standout performance with 2 hits, including a home run and 3 RBIs, and strong contributions from Ronald Acuña Jr. and Ha-Seong Kim, both hitting home runs and driving in multiple runs. Bryce Elder delivered an impressive outing on the mound, allowing only 1 earned run while striking out 6 batters. The Braves' offense was relentless, accumulating 10 runs on 11 hits, while their defense limited the Tigers to just 1 run.
